snippet.title: Earth Under Siege Gameplay
snippet.description:
PLAY right now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/324450/
Earth Under Siege is the result of an AWESOME formula: Tower Defense + Action Shooter!

This Earth Under Siege gameplay video shows new graphics and sfx. 

Follow us on:
http://www.earthundersiege.com
http://www.facebook.com/earthundersiege
http://twitter.com/earthundersiege
